name: Glou - Jump to infinity!
description:
Can you help Glou and his peers?

Welcome to Glou, a new game in which you will have to jump to infinity to avoid endless obstacles in infinite levels as you collect endless coins and gems to free all your friends!

Intriguing isn't it?

The graphics are simple and clean, but don't be fooled by appearances, Glou is a difficult and challenging game, which will require dedication and patience to be mastered and hopefully reach a respectable distance!Full game Features :
RANDOMIZED LEVELS
Each stage is randomized from beginning to end, which means you will never face the same pattern twice!

THREE DIFFERENT STYLES
In Glou you will have to face three different styles of play: the classic one bouncing on the walls and avoiding obstacles; A completely straight section in which it will be the speed of tap your ace up your sleeve; And a pinball section in which to free Gloo using a ball and hitting obstacles!

ENEMIES AND OBSTACLES FROM EVERYWHERE
You won't have to distract yourself for a moment because it will be your end. Hidden traps, deadly obstacles, rotating blades and much more!

UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS
Glou won't be alone! His eccentric friends will be there to help him! Will you be able to free them all?

PROVE TO BE THE BEST!

Compete in the global ranking to show the whole world that you know how to jump higher than everyone!

And beyond that ...
- A magnificent soundtrack;
- Leaderboard with GameCenter and GooglePlay support;
- No advertising during gameplay!

How far will you be able to push yourself?
